post.html: Java performance advice is easy to find; sometimes good performance advice is harder to find! This talk will explore popular performance myths and explain when they’re true and when they’re definitely not true.

authornote.html: Holly Cummins. Holly Cummins is a Senior Principal Software Engineer at Red Hat, in the Quarkus Team. She is a keynote speaker, author, and bad illustrator.
